intro: Hydnocarpus beccarianus, commonly known as the beccarian tamarind, is a tropical tree native to Southeast Asia. The plant produces a unique type of fruit known as a hydnoid, which has a spongy, sponge-like interior. It is also noted for its aromatic seeds and has been used in traditional medicine.
